Html:
How do I go about updating my express version of Version 3 Beta 1 to apply bug fixes etc?
Am I right in trying to update the code through using source control?
I have tried this but by downloading a repository from the source tab but I haven't a clue what to do with it. Will this only work if I have a full version of Visual Studio?
How do I apply the changes to the SQL database on the host? Is this supposed to be automatic?
Some advice and clarification please.

The whole package downloaded from source control will only work in VS Standard, Pro, and Team Suite.

You should do a file diff to see which files have changed and then replace those.

Your DB is not affected when you do an upgrade.
